name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 8 relics.
- Requires Basemod, StSLib to run.

v0.5.0
- Potion Sack UI improvements
- KOR localization
- Buff: Bambu Sword, Frenzy, Snatch, Tree Growth, Wool Gloves, Duality, Echo of Nature, Feeling Fine, Grow Book, Stone Fence
- Nerf: Convert, Misfortune, Glowing Plant, Venom Barrier, Bomber Form, Poison Mastery
-Changed: Scherry Throw, Big Pouch, Recovery Herb, Uplift, Bomber Form
- Bug Fix: Grass Hammer, Fruit Force(?), Upgrade Bag
- Lucky Clover was replaced by Grass Knot
- Now Ghost in a Jar is available for The Gatherer.

- For more information, visit
https://github.com/Celicath/GathererMod/releases
